title: QoS setup for league?
body: Trying to setup qos for league check link if you don't know what I'm talking about

replies.body:
It looks like you just need a range of ports to prioritize League over other traffic.  We have [fairly detailed information about port forwarding](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq8) that should be able to help out with this!

Give me a heads up if you have any further questions!
